predicate.note: Frames file for 'equip' based on sentences in wsj and automati expansion via verbnet.

example.name: all args
example.text: It also issued a final rule requiring auto makers to equip light trucks and minivans with lap-shoulder belts for rear seats beginning in the 1992 model year.

example.name: passive
example.text: In September, the department had said it will require trucks and minivans to be equipped *trace* with the same front-seat headrests that have long been required on passenger cars.
example.arg: the same front-seat headrests that have long been required on passenger cars

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But Humana says its own facilities could serve its insured for less if they were properly equipped.
